resources.string: Welcome to the Password Manager App!

Welcome to our secure platform! Setting up your master password is crucial. This password is your key to accessing all your valuable information. Remember, once set, your master password can never be changed or edited. Please choose wisely and ensure you keep it safe and secure. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us. Happy securing!
Unable to authenticate user due to %s

Surely, you can do better!! try different cases and special characters
